name: Wing Commander: Prophecy
description:
Wing Commander: Prophecy is a simulation game developed by Origin Systems and Raylight Studios. It was originally released in 1997. Destination Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Wing Commander: Prophecy is available on Game Boy Advance and PC.
It was produced by David Downing, Mark Day, Phil Wattenbarger and Prem Krishnan. Anthony Morone (game) and Frank Roan directed the game. Andrew Sega, Bill Munyon, George Oldziey and George Oldziey (PS2 scored the game.
